commit message:
AbstractViewController.dispatchKeyEvent(): return true on KeyEvent.ACTION_UP to suppress beeps from volume keys.
This is restoring a bit of code that was removed in e7432ad3c6fb66de67e149488d21d4d769dff49c

Merge pull request #179 from LaurentMox/master

Partially updated french translations

Update mupdf to 1.9a
- Disabled overrides/fonts.patch because it no longer applies cleanly due to refactoring in mupdf
- Core.mk and ThirdParty.mk update from mupdf repository. Paths tweaked to build in our repository, and restored the -DNOCJK flag we were using.

Core.mk: add -DTOFU to disable noto fonts.
This is purely to keep our APK size about the same as before.

document-viewer-armeabi-v7a-debug.apk
b754c9a (master with mupdf 1.7): 3930115 bytes
previous commit with mupdf 1.9a, -DNOCJK: 8124808 bytes
this commit, -DNOCJK, -DTOFU: 4090973 bytes

Merge pull request #157 from ericwa/fix-autocrop-scrolling

DecodeServiceBase.calculateRootCropping(): remove goToPage call

Add Automatic rotation option to Book Settings.

Partially reverts 9eefa8a945dc1361640055337134a807552e2f8b.
Fixes https://github.com/SufficientlySecure/document-viewer/issues/147

Merge pull request #183 from megaminxwin/patch-1

Update common.html

Merge pull request #182 from ericwa/mupdf1.9a

Update mupdf to 1.9a
updates to build.gradle and gradle-wrapper.properties made by Android Studio 2.1.1
Remove mupdf fontpack settings, no longer supported since merging https://github.com/SufficientlySecure/document-viewer/pull/182
